predictions.text: On 2025-09-21 (JST release window), the Bank of Japan will leave its short-term policy rate unchanged at its September meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: BoJ Monetary Policy Statement shows the uncollateralized overnight call rate target/band unchanged from the prior meeting.
monitoring_signals: Japan core CPI and wage growth surprises
USD/JPY level and volatility
10-year JGB yield movements and BOJ bond operations
Credible media leaks prior to decision
predictions.rationale: Domestic inflation is easing and yen weakness argues against tightening now; BoJ likely waits for more data.

predictions.text: Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 22.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Official Cboe daily close of VIX ≥ 22.00 on any session through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: S&P 500 drawdowns and realized volatility
Credit spreads (CDX IG/HY) widening
Geopolitical headlines and event risk calendar
Options market skew and VVIX levels
predictions.rationale: Post-Fed regime shift, macro data volatility, and geopolitical risks raise odds of a volatility spike.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or above $74,000 on at least one day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance BTC-USD or major exchange data shows an intraday high or close ≥ $74,000 on any UTC date through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Spot Bitcoin ETF net inflows/outflows
Dollar index (DXY) and U.S. real yields
Crypto perpetual funding rates and open interest
Risk sentiment in tech/growth equities
predictions.rationale: Easier U.S. financial conditions and potential ETF inflows support upside tail moves.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub natural gas front-month futures will settle at or above $3.20 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official daily settlement for the front-month NG futures contract ≥ $3.20/MMBtu on any session through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Weather-driven HDD/CDD forecasts
U.S. production and LNG feedgas volumes
Weekly EIA storage deviations from 5-year average
European TTF price moves and supply risks
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand, storage trajectory, and LNG dynamics raise the chance of a Q4 price pop.

predictions.text: U.S. Initial Jobless Claims (seasonally adjusted) will be at or above 245,000 in at least one weekly report released by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Department of Labor UI Weekly Claims news release shows Initial Claims SA ≥ 245,000 in any weekly print through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Continuing claims trend and insured unemployment levels
Layoff announcements (e.g., Challenger) and hiring freezes
Strike activity and seasonal adjustment quirks
Business surveys indicating demand softening
predictions.rationale: Softening labor indicators and slowing growth increase the odds of a claims uptick.

predictions.text: Copernicus ERA5 global surface air temperature for September 2025 will be the warmest September on record, per C3S monthly bulletin released by 2025-10-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Copernicus Climate Change Service monthly bulletin or dataset explicitly ranks September 2025 as warmest September since record start.
monitoring_signals: Global SST anomalies and marine heatwaves
Daily reanalysis anomalies leading into month-end
ENSO state and tropospheric temperature indices
predictions.rationale: Persistently elevated SSTs and recent records point to another monthly high-water mark.

predictions.text: The MBA Refinance Share of Mortgage Applications will reach at or above 36% in at least one weekly report released by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Mortgage Bankers Association Weekly Mortgage Applications Survey shows the refinance share of total applications ≥ 36% in any release through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: 30-year and 15-year mortgage rate levels
MBS spreads and rate lock volumes
Refi application volumes and lender pricing changes
predictions.rationale: Rate cuts and falling mortgage rates should boost the refi mix temporarily.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 3.95% on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS2 daily close ≤ 3.95% on any trading day through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Fed funds futures path for 2025-2026
Core inflation prints (CPI, PCE)
Treasury auction demand and term premium proxies
Economic surprise indices
predictions.rationale: Market pricing of additional easing and cooling inflation bias the 2y lower at least briefly.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the U.S. Commerce Department’s BIS will publish a Federal Register rule expanding export controls on advanced AI chips to China.
predictions.verification_criteria: A BIS interim/final rule appears in the Federal Register expanding performance thresholds or scope for AI accelerators/semiconductor tools to China.
monitoring_signals: Administration statements on tech controls
Hill pressure and hearings on China tech
Industry lobbying disclosures
Chinese retaliatory measures or procurement shifts
predictions.rationale: Escalating U.S.-China tech tensions and precedent of iterative BIS updates support new curbs.

predictions.text: Nikkei 225 (^N225) will close at or above 42,500 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31 (Tokyo time).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official close of the Nikkei 225 index ≥ 42,500 on any trading day through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: USD/JPY movements
BoJ policy stance and 10Y JGB yields
Foreign investor net flows into Japan
Earnings revisions for major exporters
predictions.rationale: A weaker yen and steady BoJ policy support Japanese equities near record highs.

predictions.text: The Conference Board U.S. Consumer Confidence Index for September 2025 will be at or below 102.0 in the 2025-09-24 release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Conference Board press release shows headline Consumer Confidence Index ≤ 102.0 for September 2025.
monitoring_signals: Gasoline prices and real wage trends
Equity market moves during the survey window
Labor market indicators (claims, job postings)
Political/policy uncertainty headlines
predictions.rationale: Softening labor sentiment and mixed markets tend to weigh on confidence readings.
